00019 #include "cswordbiblemoduleinfo.h"
00020 #include "cswordversekey.h"

00025 //Sword includes
00026 #include <versekey.h>

00028 static VerseKey staticKey;
00029 
00030 CSwordBibleModuleInfo::CSwordBibleModuleInfo( SWModule* module )
00031     : CSwordModuleInfo(module) {
00032     m_bookList = 0;
00033     m_cachedLocale = "unknown";
00034     m_hasOT = m_hasNT = -1;
00035 }
00036 
00037 CSwordBibleModuleInfo::CSwordBibleModuleInfo( const CSwordBibleModuleInfo& m ) : CSwordModuleInfo(m) {
00038     if (m.m_bookList) {
00039         m_bookList = new QStringList();
00040         *m_bookList = *m.m_bookList;
00041     }   
00042     m_hasOT = m.m_hasOT;
00043     m_hasNT = m.m_hasNT;
00044     m_cachedLocale = m.m_cachedLocale;  
00045 }
00046 
00047 CSwordModuleInfo* CSwordBibleModuleInfo::clone(){
00048     return new CSwordBibleModuleInfo(*this);
00049 }
00050 
00051 CSwordBibleModuleInfo::~CSwordBibleModuleInfo(){
00052     delete m_bookList;
00053 }
00054 
00056 QStringList* CSwordBibleModuleInfo::books() {
00057     if (m_cachedLocale != backend()->booknameLanguage()){   //if the locale has changed
00058         delete m_bookList;
00059         m_bookList = 0;
00060     }
00061     
00062     if (!m_bookList) {
00063         m_bookList = new QStringList(); 
00064         if (m_hasOT == -1)
00065             m_hasOT = hasTestament(OldTestament);
00066         if (m_hasNT == -1)
00067             m_hasNT = hasTestament(NewTestament);
00068             
00069         int min = 0;                
00070         int max = 1;
00071         //find out if we have ot and nt, only ot or only nt
00072         if (m_hasOT>0 && m_hasNT>0) {
00073             min = 0;
00074             max = 1;
00075         }
00076         else if (m_hasOT>0 && !m_hasNT) {
00077             min = 0;
00078             max = 0;
00079         }
00080         else if (!m_hasOT && m_hasNT>0) {
00081             min = 1;
00082             max = 1;
00083         }
00084         else if (!m_hasOT && !m_hasNT) { //somethings wrong here! - no OT and not NT
00085             qWarning("CSwordBibleModuleInfo (%s) no OT and not NT! Check config.", module()->Name());
00086             min = 0;
00087             max = -1;           
00088         }
00089 
00090         staticKey.setLocale(LocaleMgr::systemLocaleMgr.getDefaultLocaleName());
00091         for (int i = min; i <= max; ++i) {
00092             for ( int j = 0; j < staticKey.BMAX[i]; ++j) {
00093                 m_bookList->append( QString::fromLocal8Bit(staticKey.books[i][j].name) );
00094             }
00095         }
00096         m_cachedLocale = backend()->booknameLanguage();     
00097     }
00098     return m_bookList;
00099 }
00100 
00102 const unsigned int CSwordBibleModuleInfo::chapterCount(const unsigned int book) {
00103     int result = 0;
00104     if ( (book >= 1) && book <= (unsigned int)staticKey.BMAX[0] && hasTestament(OldTestament)) {        //Is the book in the old testament?
00105         result = (staticKey.books[0][book-1].chapmax);
00106     }
00107     else if ((book >= 1) && (book - staticKey.BMAX[0]) <= (unsigned int)staticKey.BMAX[1] && hasTestament(NewTestament) ) { //is the book in the new testament?
00108         result = (staticKey.books[1][book-1-staticKey.BMAX[0]].chapmax);
00109     }
00110     return result;
00111 }
00112 
00114 const unsigned int CSwordBibleModuleInfo::verseCount( const unsigned int book, const unsigned int chapter ) {
00115     unsigned int result = 0;
00116     if (book>=1 && (book <= (unsigned int)staticKey.BMAX[0]) && hasTestament(OldTestament) ) { //Is the book in the old testament?
00117         if (chapter <= chapterCount(book) ) //does the chapter exist?
00118             result = (staticKey.books[0][book-1].versemax[chapter-1]);
00119     }
00120     else if (book>=1 && (book - staticKey.BMAX[0]) <= (unsigned int)staticKey.BMAX[1] && hasTestament(NewTestament)) {  //is the book in the new testament?
00121         if (chapter <= chapterCount(book) ) //does the chapter exist?
00122             result = staticKey.books[1][book-1-staticKey.BMAX[0]].versemax[chapter-1];
00123     }
00124     return result;
00125 }
00126 
00127 const unsigned int CSwordBibleModuleInfo::bookNumber(const QString &book){
00128     unsigned int bookNumber = 0;
00129     bool found = false;
00130     staticKey.setLocale(LocaleMgr::systemLocaleMgr.getDefaultLocaleName());
00131     int min = 0;
00132     int max = 1;    
00133     //find out if we have ot and nt, only ot or only nt
00134     if ((m_hasOT>0 && m_hasNT>0) || (m_hasOT == m_hasNT == -1)) {
00135         min = 0;
00136         max = 1;
00137         bookNumber = 0;
00138     }
00139     else if (m_hasOT>0 && !m_hasNT) {
00140         min = 0;
00141         max = 0;
00142         bookNumber = 0;     
00143     }
00144     else if (!m_hasOT && m_hasNT>0) {
00145         min = 1;
00146         max = 1;
00147         bookNumber = staticKey.BMAX[0];     
00148     }
00149     else if (!m_hasOT && !m_hasNT) {
00150         min = 0;
00151         max = -1; //no loop
00152         bookNumber = 0;
00153     }
00154     
00155     for (int i = min; i <= max && !found; ++i) {
00156         for ( int j = 0; j < staticKey.BMAX[i] && !found; ++j) {
00157             ++bookNumber;
00158             if (book == QString::fromLocal8Bit( staticKey.books[i][j].name) )
00159                 found = true;
00160         }
00161     }       
00162     return bookNumber;
00163 }
00164 
00166 const bool CSwordBibleModuleInfo::hasTestament( CSwordBibleModuleInfo::Testament type ) {
00167     if (m_hasOT == -1 || m_hasNT == -1) {           
00168         *module() = TOP; //position to first entry
00169         VerseKey key( module()->KeyText() );
00170         if (key.Testament() == 1) { // OT && NT
00171             m_hasOT = 1;
00172         }
00173         else if (key.Testament() == 2) { //no OT
00174             m_hasOT = 0;
00175         }
00176         
00177         *module() = BOTTOM;
00178         key = module()->KeyText();
00179         if (key.Testament() == 1) { // only OT, no NT
00180             m_hasNT = 0;
00181         }
00182         else if (key.Testament() == 2) { //has NT
00183             m_hasNT = 1;
00184         }
00185     }
00186 
00187     switch (type) {
00188         case OldTestament:
00189             return m_hasOT>0;
00190         case NewTestament:
00191             return m_hasNT>0;       
00192         default:
00193             return false;
00194     }
00195 }
